snippet: Coach Joachim Loew left Germany's all-time leading scorer on the bench in the World Cup opener against Portugal and it proved to be the right move....

headline.print_headline: Germany Scores 4 Without a Striker in Lineup
headline.main: Germany Scores 4 Without a Striker in Lineup

lead_paragraph: Coach Joachim Loew left Germany's all-time leading scorer on the bench in the World Cup opener against Portugal and it proved to be the right move.
